markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Water Conjuration](/Feats.aspx?ID=2304) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You carry the ocean with you wherever you go. You can cast [_create water_](/Spells.aspx?ID=53) as a primal innate spell once per day. Each time you cast create water, you choose if you create fresh water or salt water.
name: Water Conjuration

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Water Conjuration Source Ancestry Guide pg. 14 2.0 --- You carry the ocean with you wherever you go. You can cast create water as a primal innate spell once per day. Each time you cast create water, you choose if you create fresh water or salt water.
